You know, I've been satisfied with my Lumia 920. However, it'd be really nice to get the Lumia Denim update. I left AT&T a year ago to get my phone legally unlocked and go prepaid, but to update, I need to have an AT&T SIM card in the 920, be connected to wi-fi, and AT&T needs to put out the update that has been out for more than six months.

Can you guys PLEASE make a program that end-users can download, and that program just gets the appropriate firmware and software updates directly from Microsoft? AT&T and other networks around the world keep the update from happening for so long, but android phones and apple devices get their updates on their own, without being filtered by the carriers.

Again, I left AT&T a year ago, my phone is legally unlocked, every other nation in the world has the Lumia Denim update for the 920, but I'm here in the US waiting to get my AT&T branded, off-contract, unlocked Lumia 920 to be as up to date as Microsoft wants it to be.
